detaileddescription.para: memory layout: byte0, byte1, byte2... memory: [G2:0,B4:0], [R4:0,G5:3], [G2:0,B4:0], [R4:0,G5:3], ...
memory: B, G, R, A, B, G, ...
memory: A, R, G, B, A, R, ...

job
hpm_jpeg job pointer
Note: The function is called in isr, long-time or complex operation are not recommend.

briefdescription.para: Deinitializte hpm_jpeg component and free source.

parameterdescription.para: 1: The buffer of file will be used by decoder. 0: Firstly, the buffer of file is copied to internal buffer and the internal buffer will be used.

briefdescription.para: Set a buffer that is used by decoder out image to job.

detaileddescription.para:
job
decode job pointer
buf
Receive decode image data. the buf will be used decoder, so nocacheable buffer is recommend.
len
The buf length
failed code
Note: Internal buffer will be used if the buf have not been set.

job
decode job pointer
cb
job state notice callback
failed code
Note: The cb is called in isr, long-time or complex operation are not recommend.

briefdescription.para: Free decode job. All source of job will be free.

parameterdescription.para: 1: The buffer of file will be used by encoder. 0: Firstly, the buffer of image is copied to internal buffer and the internal buffer will be used.

briefdescription.para: Set a buffer that is used by encoder out jpeg file to job.

detaileddescription.para:
job
encode job pointer
buf
Receive encode jpeg file data. the buf will be used encoder, so nocacheable buffer is recommend.
len
The buf length
failed code
Note: Internal buffer will be used if the buf have not been set.

job

cb
